values.description: Market on close (MOC) orders fill at the official closing auction price for a security. Markets that operate 24/7 don't support MOC orders.
values.keywords: Market on close orders, MOC orders, official closing auction price, MarketOnCloseOrder method, order properties, order tickets, buying power buffer, order fill modeling, update orders
